TopicTitle: Is there anyway to change your display name on the forums?

Articles.Content: Is there any way besides a new account?

There is a thread to ask the moderators to change your name. I think it's called the "name change thread" or something. You can only change your name once though, so choose wisely. Having multiple accounts is not allowed per forum rules

There is a thread to ask the moderators to change your name. I think it's called the "name change thread" or something. You can only change your name once though, so choose wisely. Having multiple accounts is not allowed per forum rules

found it
What Galileo said, with link.

Moved over to the Kerbal Network, the forum for forum questions.

Answered correctly by the above posters, post in the linked thread and we'll change it for you. One change only, though.
